flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Ever walk by those fancy $150 guitar hero controllers made from real guitars and want one? I don't have $150, but I do have $40. Take a guitar hero controller and place it in a new wooden professional body.
guide.introduction_rendered: Ever walk by those fancy $150 guitar hero controllers made from real guitars and want one? I don't have $150, but I do have $40. Take a guitar hero controller and place it in a new wooden professional body.
guide.summary: Using a guitar hero controller, we can make a real guitar hero controller. The whole things costs around $30-$40 if you shop smart. Woodworking, soldering, a hearty laugh, and general wits will be required to successfully complete this project.
guide.title: Professional Guitar Hero Controller
